title: Grenfell Support News
description_short: Grenfell Support News was a weekly newsletter published by Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council for people affected by the 2017 Grenfell Tower fire.
description_long:
Grenfell Support News was a weekly newsletter published by Kensington and Chelsea London Borough Council for people affected by the 2017 Grenfell Tower fire. The newsletter was published in three languages: English, Farsi and Arabic. It was discontinued in February 2019.
There is no issue 28 as Grenfell Support had "problems" with that issue.

Bulk Downloads:
All Issues: grenfell-support-news.zip
English: grenfell-support-news-english.zip
Arabic: grenfell-support-news-arabic.zip
Farsi: grenfell-support-news-farsi.zip
